titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: A bitter day with alterations of mocking bright sunshine and icy rain. At 8 a.m. I went to S. Margaret's and read the Ante-Communion Service.
At Mattins there was a fair congregation considering the weather, and I preached on the episode of the Penitent Thief. At Evensong Campbell preached.
